Description:
Elkho Group is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Partner to join our client, a top Consulting firm.In charge of big, complicated projects and offering engagements with subject-matter expertise
Responsible for the growth of the Risk consulting business and taking on a leadership role in growing services within the Financial Services sector (banking and Insurance)Skills
Skills:
15-20+ years of experience earned in an audit or consulting firm, with few years in a leadership position and knowledge of the financial services industry, within risk consulting services.
Degree in Accounting/ Finance/ Business or related disciplines and professional qualification i.e. ICAEW, ACCA, CPA
